323811.「あはは！ 何度見ても\n あたし すっごい いい笑顔！\n <pc>に 撮って:
Ahaha! No matter how many times I see,
I just have the greatest smile, don't I?!
Maybe it's because you took the picture?

323812.「バーベキューも おいしかったな～。\n 鉄板で焼く お肉が ジューシーで！\n:
The barbecue was sooo good!
The grilled meat was super juicy! I ate
so much!

323813.「それでさ……お肉 おいしいから\n やっぱり ラキにも\n 食べてほしいなーっ:
And, I thought...since this meat is just so
delicious, I really want Lycae to try some
too.

323814.「おみやげに お肉ぎっしりサンドイッチを\n 買って 帰ったんだよね。\n えと:
I bought you a sandwich filled with meat as
a souvenir! So, um...how was it, Lycae?

323815.「……ポルテが しつこいから 食べたけど\n ラキには よく わからなかった。\:
Porte was insistent, so Lycae ate it.
But Lycae couldn't really understand it...
Like its taste, or how delicious it was...

323816.「そっか……ラキは ごはん食べないし\n 味覚とか わかんなくて トーゼンなのか:
I see... You don't eat food, so maybe you
just don't have any sense of taste.

323817.「でもさ ラキ。味は わからなくても\n 感じたことはあるんじゃない？\n おク:
But, Lycae...if even you can't taste it, you must've at least FELT it, right? Like... "Oh, my mouth is so happy!" or "I feel so
good!"

323819.「肉をかむと……汁が出てくる。\n あと……クチのまわりが ベトベトになる。:
When biting into the meat...juices come out.
Also...it makes your mouth all sticky.

323820.「逆に ザンシンな 食レポ……！: Quite the brutally honest food review...!

323822.「……えへへー。\n また おみやげ 買ってくるからね！:
Ehehe... I'll just have to buy you a souvenir
again!
